name: FoddianTank
description:
This is my entry for the Ludwig Jam

All assets used are free and can be found online or were created by me and can be downloaded from my GitHub. Enjoy!

HOW TO PLAY

Use the WASD keys to rotate

Aim with your MOUSE and fire with LEFT CLICK

TIPS

Play with the ANGLE of fire to control your speed

Reach the RED TILE
